thread.title: Manju Warrier thanks Rani Padmini crew
thread.title_full: Manju Warrier thanks Rani Padmini crew - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Manju Warrier thanks Rani Padmini crew
text:
Manju Warrier has thanked the crew of Rani Padmini for the responses the film has been getting.
"The success is not mine, but ours. If my film career is a journey, each one of you is a fellow traveller," she wrote, about the crew. I thank each one of you who became like family after the two month's shoot, besides Aashiq and Rima."
Rani Padmini stars Manju and Rima in the lead roles, and is a travel movie. It released today.
